price: 35. Tónna luk yalla nummayse marak tet addal (Nabii luut mcelah magaala kinnuk) sugtcm neyyeeqeh.
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā mina al-mu'minīna
